game.name: Pool Party
game.description:
The two beautiful girls Ariel and Rapunzel want to organize a wonderful pool party in the coming weekend. So they have approached Elsa who has recently completed a degree in party planning. At present, Elsa has two different pool party locations, but she wants to decorate them before showing to the two princesses. Can you help Elsa to decorate every location and help their clients make a quick decision over the location selection? Join Pool Party and be prepared to play the role of a party planner!


Elsa has a full faith on your decoration abilities so try to mix and match as many items as you can until you create the fabulous party locations. Guide Elsa to organize the dream pool party of their friends in this HTML5 decoration games for girls! Set up two different locations one by one in just a few simple clicks on the screen! Decorate the first location by placing a huge pool in the middle and floaters with some cool refreshments!
Make sure to improve its look with a table with some fruity cocktails, sun chairs, and umbrellas for shade. When you are done, ask the girls to check and be thrilled by your amazing work. No need to take rest, move to the second location. This location will have a different deck but has the same view. Give it a peaceful pool along with some classic cocktails, colorful umbrellas and colorful striped sun chairs! Now girls have to decide which location will suit them the most for the pool party. Play more free pool party games and have fun without download!
